children.title: Is It a Bird?
children.description: Look at a Parrot through a Spyglass

children.title: Is It a Balloon?
children.description: Look at a Ghast through a Spyglass

children.title: Monster Hunter
children.description: Kill any hostile monster

children.title: A Throwaway Joke
children.description:
Throw a Trident at something.
Note: Throwing away your only weapon is not a good idea

children.title: It Spreads
children.description: Kill a mob near a Sculk Catalyst

children.title: Take Aim
children.description: Shoot something with an Arrow

children.title: Monsters Hunted
children.description: Kill one of every hostile monster

children.title: Postmortal
children.description: Use a Totem of Undying to cheat death

children.title: What a Deal!
children.description: Successfully trade with a Villager

children.title: Hired Help
children.description: Summon an Iron Golem to help defend a village

children.title: Star Trader
children.description: Trade with a Villager at the build height limit

children.title: Sticky Situation
children.description: Jump into a Honey Block to break your fall

children.title: Ol' Betsy
children.description: Shoot a Crossbow

children.title: Two Birds, One Arrow
children.description: Kill two Phantoms with a piercing Arrow

children.title: Who's the Pillager Now?
children.description: Give a Pillager a taste of their own medicine

children.title: Surge Protector
children.description: Protect a Villager from an undesired shock without starting a fire

children.title: Caves & Cliffs
children.description: Free fall from the top of the world (build limit) to the bottom of the world and survive

children.title: Sneak 100
children.description: Sneak near a Sculk Sensor or Warden to prevent it form detecting you

children.title: Sweet Dreams
children.description: Sleep in a Bed to change your respawn point

children.title: Adventuring Time
children.description: Discover every biome

children.title: Sound of Music
children.description: Make the Meadows come alive with the sound of music from a Jukebox

children.title: Light as a Rabbit
children.description: Walk on Powder Snow...without sinking in it
